[Y]Next Month Board
[W]Plans are bold, deadlines are louder.
[c][m.]
[W]We are prepping a joystick stress test
[W]and another beginner assembly
[W]workshop.
[W]Reader projects will get a full
[W]spotlight if they include notes and
[W]source.
[c][m.]
[G]- Hardware clinic.
[G]- Classroom coding pack.
[G]- Reader score league.
[m][m-]
[Y]TRY THIS
[C]Send one bug story and one fix that
[C]worked.
[c][m.]
